text: Alfred Gore Miers (26 May 1869 – 23 September 1944) was an Australian rules footballer for the Port Adelaide Football Club.https://australianfootball.com/players/player/Alfred%2BMiers/18578 ==References== Category:Australian rules footballers from South Australia Category:Port Adelaide Football Club (SANFL) players Category:Port Adelaide Football Club players (all competitions) Category:1869 births Category:1944 deaths
title: Alf Miers
